name: DEMO_2D_Music Swapper
description:
A larger, 2d platformer style demo including:

  • A basic 2d character controller with sprite changing for Movement and a double jump
  • A biome changing system which effects both parallax background and current song
  • A UI for changing independent volumes of game elements

Please find the Unity Assets Available Here:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/136U1A1KVdmnhor-zGxaujn5350nH9Yts/view?usp=share...
